title: I try... I really do...
body:
I try to hear Aurelion Sol talking i really do.... but... but i just hear Madara Uchiha talking about stars...


Not that thats a bad thing tho xD
its the perfect voice for both characters.

replies.body: Watching Naruto in Japanese with subs could remedy this for you.
So would playing league in Japanese, but neither option would be as fun.
I disagree playing League of Legends in japanese is great change and you find it more enjoyable. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I have actually done it, but its not as cool as in english haha cos my fave voice actors are english :p
I didn't do it personally, i just played on my friends account while he had it active, I'm not sure how he did it but he replaced the english voice files with the newly made Japanese ones.
